entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
